tooltip: Select King Bulblin as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: King Bulblin focuses on improving Bulblin units.
Allows you to summon King Bulblin, a strong mounted cavalry hero.
Durable Siege Creature unit that rams its targets.
Bullbo Riders have a 50% increased chance to survive the death of their mount.
Bulblin Thugs and Bullbo Riders are outfitted with armor and a shield.
